    Field Name Bits Mask Value Shifted Value Description
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_108_ATTR_VC0_TOTAL_CREDITS_PD 10:0 7ff 20 20 Number of credits that should be advertised for Posted data received on Virtual Channel 0. The bytes advertised must be less than or equal to the bram bytes available. See VC0_RX_RAM_LIMIT; EP=0x0020; RP=0x00B5
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_108@0XFD4801B0 31:0 7ff 20 ATTR_108

    Register ( slcr )ATTR_109

    Register Name Address Width Type Reset Value Description
    ATTR_109 0XFD4801B4 32 rw 0x00000000 --

    Field Name Bits Mask Value Shifted Value Description
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_109_ATTR_TECRC_EP_INV 15:15 8000 0 0 Not currently in use. Invert ECRC generated by block when trn_tecrc_gen_n and trn_terrfwd_n are asserted.; EP=0x0000; RP=0x0000
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_109_ATTR_RECRC_CHK_TRIM 14:14 4000 1 4000 Enables td bit clear and ECRC trim on received TLP's FALSE == don't trim TRUE == trim.; EP=0x0001; RP=0x0001
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_109_ATTR_RECRC_CHK 13:12 3000 3 3000 Enables ECRC check on received TLP's 0 == don't check 1 == always check 3 == check if enabled by ECRC check enable bit of AER cap structure; EP=0x0003; RP=0x0003
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_109_ATTR_VC0_TX_LASTPACKET 11:7 f80 1c e00 Index of last packet buffer used by TX TLM (i.e. number of buffers - 1). Calculated from max payload size supported and the number of brams configured for transmit; EP=0x001C; RP=0x001C
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_109_ATTR_VC0_TOTAL_CREDITS_PH 6:0 7f 4 4 Number of credits that should be advertised for Posted headers received on Virtual Channel 0. The sum of the posted, non posted, and completion header credits must be <= 80; EP=0x0004; RP=0x0020
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_109@0XFD4801B4 31:0 ffff 7e04 ATTR_109

    Register ( slcr )ATTR_34

    Register Name Address Width Type Reset Value Description
    ATTR_34 0XFD480088 32 rw 0x00000000 --

    Field Name Bits Mask Value Shifted Value Description
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_34_ATTR_HEADER_TYPE 7:0 ff 0 0 Specifies values to be transferred to Header Type register. Bit 7 should be set to '0' indicating single-function device. Bit 0 identifies header as Type 0 or Type 1, with '0' indicating a Type 0 header.; EP=0x0000; RP=0x0001
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_34_ATTR_INTERRUPT_PIN 15:8 ff00 1 100 Indicates mapping for legacy interrupt messages. Valid values are 1 INTA, 2 INTB, 3 INTC, 4 INTD. Zero indicates no legacy interrupt messages used.; EP=0x0001; RP=0x0001
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_34@0XFD480088 31:0 ffff 100 ATTR_34

    Register ( slcr )ATTR_53

    Register Name Address Width Type Reset Value Description
    ATTR_53 0XFD4800D4 32 rw 0x00000000 --

    Field Name Bits Mask Value Shifted Value Description
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_53_ATTR_PM_CAP_NEXTPTR 7:0 ff 60 60 PM Capability's Next Capability Offset pointer to the next item in the capabilities list, or 00h if this is the final capability.; EP=0x0048; RP=0x0060

    Register ( slcr )ATTR_101

    Register Name Address Width Type Reset Value Description
    ATTR_101 0XFD480194 32 rw 0x00000000 --

    Field Name Bits Mask Value Shifted Value Description
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_101_ATTR_ENABLE_MSG_ROUTE 15:5 ffe0 0 0 Enable the routing of message TLPs to the user through the TRN RX interface. A bit value of 1 enables routing of the message TLP to the user. Messages are always decoded by the message decoder. Bit 0 - ERR COR, Bit 1 - ERR NONFATAL, Bit 2 - ERR FATAL, Bit 3 - INTA Bit 4 - INTB, Bit 5 - INTC, Bit 6 - INTD, Bit 7 PM_PME, Bit 8 - PME_TO_ACK, Bit 9 - unlock, Bit 10 PME_Turn_Off; EP=0x0000; RP=0x07FF
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_101_ATTR_DISABLE_BAR_FILTERING 1:1 2 0 0 Disable BAR filtering. Does not change the behavior of the bar hit outputs; EP=0x0000; RP=0x0001
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_101@0XFD480194 31:0 ffe2 0 ATTR_101

If this is FALSE, then the AER structure cannot be accessed via either the link or the management port, and AER will be considered to not be present for error management tasks (such as what types of error messages are sent if an error is detected).; EP=0x0001; RP=0x0001
    PSU_PCIE_ATTRIB_ATTR_4_ATTR_AER_CAP_ON 12:12 1000 0 0 Indicates that the AER structures exists.     CSU TAMPERING

    CSU TAMPER STATUS

    Register ( slcr )tamper_status

    Register Name Address Width Type Reset Value Description
    tamper_status 0XFFCA5000 32 rw 0x00000000 --

    Field Name Bits Mask Value Shifted Value Description
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_0 0:0 1 0 0 CSU regsiter
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_1 1:1 2 0 0 External MIO
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_2 2:2 4 0 0 JTAG toggle detect
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_3 3:3 8 0 0 PL SEU error
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_4 4:4 10 0 0 AMS over temperature alarm for LPD
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_5 5:5 20 0 0 AMS over temperature alarm for APU
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_6 6:6 40 0 0 AMS voltage alarm for VCCPINT_FPD
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_7 7:7 80 0 0 AMS voltage alarm for VCCPINT_LPD
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_8 8:8 100 0 0 AMS voltage alarm for VCCPAUX
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_9 9:9 200 0 0 AMS voltage alarm for DDRPHY
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_10 10:10 400 0 0 AMS voltage alarm for PSIO bank 0/1/2
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_11 11:11 800 0 0 AMS voltage alarm for PSIO bank 3 (dedicated pins)
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS_TAMPER_12 12:12 1000 0 0 AMS voltaage alarm for GT
    PSU_CSU_TAMPER_STATUS@0XFFCA5000 31:0 1fff 0 Tamper Response Status

    CSU TAMPER RESPONSE

    psu_post_config_data

    Register Name Address Width Type Reset Value Description
    PSU_PMU_GLOBAL_REQ_PWRUP_INT_EN 0XFFD80118 32 WO 0x000000 Power-up Request Interrupt Enable Register. Writing a 1 to this location will unmask the interrupt.
    PSU_PMU_GLOBAL_REQ_PWRUP_TRIG 0XFFD80120 32 WO 0x000000 Power-up Request Trigger Register. A write of one to this location will generate a power-up request to the PMU.

    psu_post_config_data
